grith.sibboleth
Class StaticCredentialManager

java.lang.Object
  grith.sibboleth.StaticCredentialManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
CredentialManager
public class StaticCredentialManager
extends Object
implements CredentialManager

An implementation of an CredentialManager that can be used from within, for example, commandline user interfaces to login to a shib instance.

Author:
Markus Binsteiner
